FuncDef: This command separately configures the reporting modes to a PCE for RSVP-TE or SR-TE LSPs. The PCC LSP database is synchronized with the PCE LSP database using the PCEP PCRpt (PCE Report) message for PCC-controlled, PCE-computed, and PCE-controlled LSPs.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the PCE reporting mode for all TE LSPs of RSVP-TE type. Values-enable - Specifies enabling of PCE reporting for all TE LSPs of RSVP-TE type.
Specifies the PCE reporting mode for all TE LSPs of SR-TE type. Values-enable - Specifies enabling of PCE reporting for all TE LSPs of SR-TE type.

ExtraInfo: Default: pce-report rsvp-te disablepce-report sr-te disable
